metadata.title: CVE-2020-27560 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - negligible
metadata.description:
ImageMagick 7.0.10-34 allows Division by Zero in OptimizeLayerFrames inMagickCore/layer.c, which may cause a denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-27560` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

imagemagick - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
imagemagick-6-common - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
imagemagick-6.q16 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
imagemagick-6.q16hdri - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
libimage-magick-perl - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
libimage-magick-q16-perl - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
libimage-magick-q16hdri-perl - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
libmagick++-6-headers - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
libmagick++-6.q16-9t64 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
libmagick++-6.q16hdri-9t64 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
libmagickcore-6-arch-config - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
libmagickcore-6-headers - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
libmagickcore-6.q16-7-extra - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
libmagickcore-6.q16-7t64 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-7-extra - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-7t64 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
libmagickwand-6-headers - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
libmagickwand-6.q16-7t64 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
libmagickwand-6.q16hdri-7t64 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
perlmagick - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15
No subscription required

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in oracular was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu15').
